content: Captain Reynolds (Employee #1012) assigned to Flight 882 (SFO-JFK) for next quarter. Airbus A320 qualified.
First Officer Delgado (Employee #2321) assigned to 737 fleet out of LAX base. Typically covers Flight 233 (LAX-ORD).
Captain Li (Employee #987) handles red-eye flights from BOS to SEA. A321neo rated.
First Officer Smith (Employee #3332) newly qualified on 737 MAX 8. Will rotate on DFW-MIA route Flight 707.
Captain Hughes (Employee #1200) cross-trained on A319. Often assigned to short hauls DEN-SFO (Flight 300).
